main event: On 2 October 1951, multiple observers reported seeing unidentified aerial objects at White Sands, New Mexico.
interesting points: Four objects were first seen in formation with a fifth trailing behind,They were described as approximately the size of a newspaper and appeared to emit a glowing amber light,The objects moved at speeds estimated to be five times that of a rocket,No sound was associated with the sightings,The sightings lasted between 15 to 6 seconds as the objects vanished from sight.
witnesses: military personnel and various observers at White Sands Proving Ground
